body.name: Saraflora 100% Cotton Facial Tissue Soft Dry Wipe 6 Pack, Use for Sensitive Skin Disposable Face Towel Extra Thick Dry and Wet Use Disposable Cotton Tissues for Washing Face Makeup Wipes（600 Count ）
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 5% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 29 mins
features: Soft Dry Wipes: Saraflora facial tissue made of 100% Natural cotton tissue, soft and durable, strong absorption. Can be used for skin makeup remover, kitchen cleanup, baby care, daily household cleaning, etc. It is great substitute for paper tissues at home.

Dry & Wet Dual Use: Quick and strong moist absorbing natural material. Make cotton tissue is more thicker than ordinary paper towels, strong tensile strength, When wet, the fibers inside will not fall off or fall apart, and can be reused, Save on daily use of ordinary paper towels.
Friendly for Sensitive Skin: 100% Biodegradable dry wipes, unscented, non-florescent, chemical free. Ideal for baby skin care and daily cleansing for sensitive skin, No more redness and rashes.

Multi-use & Portable: Easy pack package with extractable design, convenient to carry around when travel. It can be used for Face Tissue /Disposable Face Towel / Disposable Dry Wipes/ Baby Wipes / Baby Towel / Personal Care / Make up removal / Home Clean / Car Clean.

Size: 7.9’’ x 7.9’’, 6 pack, 100 sheets per pack, total 600 sheets. Face towels paper adopts extractable design, Can be used as dry wipes for baby, disposable dry wipes, easy to use. Suitable for parties, travel, outdoor activities and travel carry. It is also a thoughtful gift for relatives and friends.
body.description: Why Choose Saraflora Cotton Tissue? Softer，Safer，More durable Wet and dry use Can replace the use of daily paper towels to wipe tables, mobile phones, cars, etc.. After soaking, it can be used as dry wipes to clean hands, face, etc. Sensitive Skin Friendly Safe ingredients and no added chemicals, ideal for baby skin care and daily cleansing for sensitive skin, no more allergies

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is cotton tissue? Saraflora Facial Tissue is made of 100% natural cotton fabric, soft but durable, Using quick and strong moist absorbing natural material. Wet and dry use, not easy to break, can be used repeatedly. It's prefect alternative to paper tissues, face towels, makeup remover towel and other products.

Wet and dry use, not easy to break, can be used repeatedly. It's prefect alternative to paper tissues, face towels, makeup remover towel and other products.

Sensitive Skin Care Cotton tissue’s softness and cleanliness is ideal for your baby.Can be used for daily cleaning of baby's face, hands, teeth, mouth and other parts Multi-use Can be used for Face Tissue /Disposable Face Towel / Disposable Dry Wipes / Personal Care / Make up removal / Home Clean/ Kitchen Clean Car Clean You never know what could happen during a trip and you don't want to leave a mess in your car. Cotton soft towel is convenience to solve your troubles Clean and Hygienic Use as a disposable towel or disposable paper towel to prevent bacterial growth and reduce breakouts and skin irritation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Go To
reviews.reviewText: I switched to these after using another brand and I prefer these. Good quality. I use them mainly for washing my face and one gets the job done. They can be used for other things as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Keep these on hand everywhere. Great for my kids. Can be used as a wet wipe (if you wet it), tissue, napkin, etc. The texture is perfect for various needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've used these for a few years now and have gone through thousands of them. They are great for blowing your nose, not so great for cleaning up messes. They produce 0 irritating fine particles when used unlike say toilet paper or cheaper tissues. They are also insanely resistant to tearing, to the point that even trying to tear them on purpose is super tough. They are definitely cotton, the fibers are very strong and do not break easily. They are not as soft as say the premium Kleenex brand ones, but those are a composite of paper and cotton and chemicals so not exactly the same thing. I like them. I am kind of worried about the fact that they are a no name Chinese company but I've never noticed off smells or stains or anything else so they appear to have good QC. Overall for the money I think they're great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very soft cotton tissues for baby skin
reviews.reviewText: I use these tissues to clean my 6 month old baby (dry and wet). The wipes are very soft (compared to other brands) and my baby doesn’t complain at all.Definitely a good purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for makeup removal
reviews.reviewText: These are soft and strong enough for make up removal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars replacement for the puff's soft packs
reviews.reviewText: stronger than the puffs, and can be used wet or dry, you have to make your own "slit" to access the tissues but they seem great
